name: [JAM] Super Brick Break Tournament!
description:
Ended up scraping several ideas and making this whole thing mostly on the last day.... sorry, couldn't code a lose condition in time.

Made for the One Minute Game Jam #4 (72 hours)

Controls: Release Left Click to attack

Goal: hit bricks with your fist

Not hitting anything will result in a longer animation time, while hitting a brick will istantly cancel the animation.

Made in Vanilla JS, original code, art & music by me.
